articles.author: MOLLY QUELL
articles.title: The top UN court is holding hearings on the Israeli military's incursion into Rafah - The Associated Press
articles.description: The United Nations’ top court is opening two days of hearings into a request from South Africa to press Israel to halt its military operation in the southern Gaza city of Rafah. More than half of Gaza’s population has sought shelter there. This is the fourth …
articles.content: THE HAGUE (AP) The United Nations top court on Thursday opened two days of hearings into a request from South Africa to press Israel to halt its military operation in the southern Gaza city of Rafah,… [+3015 chars]
